app.name: Markdown notes
app.description: A note taking app with markdown at the core, designed for advanced users.

notebook.empty_notebook: This notebook does not seem to have any notes on this day.

note.deletion_confirmation_text: Are you sure you want to delete the note?

shortcut.desc_new_note: Creates a new note when focused on an existing note.
shortcut.desc_complete_note: Marks the currently focused note as complete.
shortcut.desc_edit_note: Makes the currently focused note editable.

error.loading_database: There was an error while creating/loading the database.
error.checking_default_notebook: There was an error while checking if the default notebook exists.
error.creating_default_notebook: 'There was an error while creating the default notebook.'
error.retrieving_notebooks: There was an error while retrieving your notebooks.
error.retrieving_notebook: There was an error while retrieving information about your notebook.
error.notes_fetch_error: There was an error while fetching the notes.
error.notes_save_validation_err: Hmph! Some of the expected info for the note seems to be missing. Sorry, we couldn't save the note.
error.note_delete_validation_err: Whew! Unexpected error while deleting the note.
error.note_delete_err: There was an error while deleting the note.
error.notebook_display_error: There was an error while displaying the notes.
error.notebook_hide_error: There was an error while closing the notebook.
error.app_init: There was an error while initializing the app.
error.notes_display_error: There was an error while displaying the notes.
error.app_unstable: The application is in an unstable state and should be restarted. Sorry for the inconvinience.
error.notebook_not_found: Notebook with ID '%s' was not found.
error.shortcut_dialog_display: There was an error while displaying the shortcuts.
error.notes_update_err: There was an error while updating the note.
error.notes_modification_err: There was an error while inserting or updating the note.
error.note_fetch_error: There was an error while fetching the contents of the note.
error.notebook_container_not_found: There was an error while fetching the notebook container.
error.savenote_invalid_call: saveNote called without notebookID and noteID.
error.notes_deletion_err: There was an error while deleting the note.
error.mark_note_complete: There was an error while marking the note as complete.
error.err_date_change: There was an error while showing the notes for the given date.
error.add_new_error: There was an error while adding the note.
error.save_and_create_note: Unexpected error while saving the note.
error.settings_dialog_display: There was an error while loading the settings dialog.
error.about_dialog_display: There was an error while loading About us.

about.reporting: Found an issue or want a feature? Report
